testcase.name: User logs in
testcase.system-out: Given I open the Chrome browser and navigate to "https://www.facebook.com/".passed When I enter "03042021926" into the "email" field...........................passed When I enter "samar2487" into the "pass" field..............................passed When I click the "login" button.............................................passed Then I should be logged in successfully.....................................passed

testcase.name: User posts a status
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged into Facebook.............................................passed When I click on "What's on your mind?"......................................passed And I type "Hello, world!" into the post box................................passed And I click on "Post".......................................................passed Then my status should be posted successfully................................passed

testcase.name: User registers
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Facebook login page.......................................passed When I fill in "John" as my first name......................................passed And I fill in "Doe" as my last name.........................................passed And I enter "john.doe@example.com" as my email..............................passed And I enter "password123" as my password....................................passed And I select "10" from the day dropdown.....................................passed And I select "April" from the month dropdown................................passed And I select "1990" from the year dropdown..................................passed And I select "Male".........................................................passed Then I should be registered successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: User recovers password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Facebook login page.......................................passed When I enter "john.doe@example.com" into the email field....................passed And I click the submit button...............................................passed Then I should see a confirmation message for password recovery..............passed

testcase.name: User logs out
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged into Facebook.............................................passed When I click the "Logout" button............................................passed Then I should be logged out successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: User dismisses notification popup
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged into Facebook.............................................passed When a notification popup appears...........................................passed Then I click anywhere on the body to dismiss the popup......................passed
